meanings.definition: A bright red pigment made from mercury sulfide.
meanings.sent1: The artist used vermilion to paint the vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent2: The vermilion paint added a pop of color to the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dipped its tail in vermilion and left red prints all over the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter painted the room with a vermilion hue.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun cast a vermilion glow over the horizon.

meanings.sent1: The vermilion of the ripe strawberries was irresistible.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stunning dress in vermilion for the party.
meanings.sent3: The vermilion balloons filled the room with joy and cheer.
meanings.sent4: His anger burned with a vermilion intensity.
meanings.sent5: The vermilion of the autumn leaves painted a beautiful scene in the park.
